title: Brand Building Thought Leaders
description: Four videos from marketing and branding thought leaders

videos.title: Under Armour
videos.description: Founder and CEO of Under Armour, Kevin Plank, shares the story of how he started Under Armour and built it into a high-profile global brand. [3:31]

videos.title: Patagonia
videos.description: The founder of Patagonia explains why businesses giving back to the planet is green marketing. [2:40]
